messages.subject: My son 10  yrs, wants e-pals
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, My boy Nathan, 10yrs, wants some e-pals. He likes Pokemon, his 5 pin bowling league (Canadian eh!), Pokemon board game, Masterpiece game, Star Wars,
messages.messageBody:
Hi All, My boy Nathan, 10yrs, wants some e-pals.
He likes Pokemon, his 5 pin bowling league (Canadian eh!),
Pokemon board game, Masterpiece game, Star Wars, space stuff, Hobbit,
Lego, Kinnex, computers, drawing, painting, Discovery Channel, TLC, PBS
shows, Scrabble, Geografacts, Chess, books (especially Jedi Apprentice
series)......oh and cooking!

Buzz

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Klement Family "Education is what survives when
Darryl, Debbie, what has been learned has been
Kathleen, Nathan & forgotten"
Samantha B.F. Skinner in "New Scientist".
e-mail- klement@...
Canadian homeschool page: http:\\www.flora.org/homeschool-ca/
Ont. Federation of Teaching Parents: http:\\www.flora.org/oftp/

messages.subject: Re: My son 10  yrs, wants e-pals
messages.msgSnippet: Buzz, I have two boys, 9 and 11.  They play guitar and keyboard, play soccer and basketball, love Dragon Ball Z.  watch the cartoon and collect the cards.
messages.messageBody:
Buzz,
I have two boys, 9 and 11. They play guitar and keyboard, play soccer and
basketball, love Dragon Ball Z. watch the cartoon and collect the cards.
Oldest is into the net and music, youngest loves cartoons and cartoons! If
this sounds interesting to Nathan, let me know and we can set something up.
Teresa
